real_int_rate.description: real interest rate (relevant to the investment)

inflation_rate.source: assumed based on CBO forcast of CPI inflation

real_financial_return.description: Real gross rate of return on an investment, including supernormal returns

debt_financing.description: Debt financing share of the investment

new_equity_financing.description: New equity (not retained earnings) financing share of the investment

corp_investment_share.description: C-corporation share of private fixed investment
corp_investment_share.source: based on calculation from Jason Debacker

incshare_capital.description: Share of total income accruing to capital

capincshare_equip.description: Share of capital income accruing to equipment

capincshare_struc.description: Share of capital income accruing to structures

capincshare_ip.description: Share of capital income accruing to intellectual property

capincshare_rr.description: Share of capital income accruing to rental residential capital

dividend_credit.description: Rate of credit available on dividends paid

mtr_interest.description: MTR on marginal investor's interest income

mtr_dividends.description: MTR on marginal investor's dividend income

mtr_capitalgains.description: MTR on marginal investor's capital gains (not accrual effective)

cg_holding_period.description: Equity holding period for marginal investor
